meanings.definition: A Southeast Asian dish consisting of marinated meat skewered and grilled.
meanings.sent1: I tried the delicious satay at the Asian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The street vendor sold chicken satay with peanut sauce.
meanings.sent3: The satay was so tasty that it made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling satay filled the air with temptation.
meanings.sent5: The juicy satay was a flavorful explosion in my mouth.

meanings.definition: To cook food by grilling on skewers.
meanings.sent1: We will satay the chicken for the barbecue tonight.
meanings.sent2: She loves to satay vegetables for a healthy meal.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally satayed the marshmallows instead of grilling them.
meanings.sent4: The chef will satay the seafood to perfection.
meanings.sent5: Let's satay the kebabs until they are golden brown.
